Articles.Content:
Pro: you leave in a place where your phone never annoy with some unknown ringing, and it make all the living cells your made of very happy.

Con: your in jail

Sell your controls.

pro: you get money from the controll

con: you just sold your controlls:(

i and anyone i touch turn into clockwork by virus

pro: STEAMPUNK EVERYTHING

con; your dead due to being a statue of clockwork

omnipotence

Pro: Do anything

Con: No Challenge, No victory.

Ability to teleport to Russia and back at any time.

Pro: ability to get drunk from drinking vodka

Con: creature is killed, gutted, and it's meat is sold on the blackmarket for billions of dollars by the Norwegian Mafia. it ticks off the Russian Mafia and creates a gang war

Ability to transform into a shark with lasers

Pro(s): Swimming around, lasers, because lasers.

Con(s): I live on land, the lasers have a combined power of a mighty 1W.

Pro(s): Being indestructible

Con(s): Not existing at all

An extra foot.

Pros: You're a tripod! You can't fall over!

Cons: It's coming out of your butt. And it looks weird.

A kerbal for a head.

Pro(s): 2 extra legs (useless), 2 extra hands, less food is necessary (kerbals are humanoid plants)

Cons: The small Kerbal's brain can barely control 2 bodies

The lower, original one is digesting plant poop

The hair is now hat-shaped.

Pros: keep the sun off.

Cons: I don't like hats.

Wizardry.

Pros: YER A WIZARD

Cons: YER GONNA GET ALOT OF ENVY

Your body is made out of Kerbals.

Pro: you have the combined rocketry skills of multiple kerbals

Con: you will die like that of this one person on doctor who who was dissembled into multiple adipose (i couldn't locate the scene, on youtube, sorry)

be immune to my new cat's attacks on my feet (she's only a kitten)

Pro: Cat-proof feet.

Con: Legs still not protected...

Mutation: to be able to spontaneously explode.

Pro: you can kill the people around you any time you want

Con: you still die as a result

the ability to make hollywood bring back awesome shows

Pros: every fan is happy at the great return of said awesome TV shows

Cons: no other shows are made as a result, depriving hollywood of originality (or whatevers left of it)

The ability to turn into a duck

Pros, people feed you bread.

Cons, Duck tastes nice.

The ability to modify the ability to modify things.

Pros:you can do everything

Cons:It is very hard to do ,and if it goes wrong you got a nuclear mess to clean up.

The ability to run of steam ,and burnable fuels only.

Pros: run on anything carbon based.

Cons: you can't run on pure bacon without burning it too much.

The ability to vent feces as a gas.

Pros: Infinite personal space

Cons: Everyone doesn't want to be with you anymore, you die a lonely man

The ability to summon Jebediah Kerman
I would become the ultimate rocket scientist and thrillmaster! I'm not that thrilling

Pros: You didn't specify a mutation

Cons: You didn't specify a mutation

Become the Kraken.

Pro: Never be disrespected.

Con: SQUAD will rip you limb from limb by 1.0.0

The ability to summon Coca-cola's whenever you wish.

Pro: Soda

Con: Coca-Cola

The ability to summon Pepsi whenever you wish.

Pro: Soda

Con: Not Mountain Dew.

The ability to digest anything that is not your organs.

Pro: I always wondered what paper tastes like.

Con: That was poison?!?!

Have the abilities of Superman.
